title: Manage Drug Serialization Data
description: A supply chain analyst must ensure that serialization data for a batch of product is correctly commissioned and sent to downstream partners.

tasks.description: Receive a file of serialized product identifiers for a newly packaged batch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully ingests the file of unique serial numbers.

tasks.description: Commission the serial numbers in the central repository, associating them with the product code and lot number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the status of the serial numbers to 'Commissioned'.

tasks.description: Generate an EPCIS (Electronic Product Code Information Services) event to record the shipment of the batch to a wholesale distributor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a valid EPCIS file detailing the shipment.

tasks.description: Transmit the EPCIS file to the trading partner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the file and receives a confirmation of receipt.
